Package oracle.adf.share.statemanager

Interface Summary
CapacityPolicy  
CompressionPolicy The CompressionPolicy defines a policy for StateManager that can be used to compress and decompress the state stored by the StateManger client.
Policy Defines a state management policy.
StateManager The base StateManager interface.
 

Class Summary
DefaultContext A default initial JNDI context for the StateManager.
DefaultInitialContextFactory A simple InitialContextFactory that may be used to acquire an initial DefaultContext for the StateManager.
DefaultPolicyImpl  
StateManagerScopeAdapter The state manager specification defines a StateManagerScopeAdapter to make adapt the StateManager to a simple Map interface.
UUID  
 

Exception Summary
CapacityException
